plasma: Ọnọdụ okwu nke nwere ihe ndị e boro ebubo (ion na eletrọn)
ionic: Nkwekọrịta kpụrụ site na mmasi n'etiti ion ndị ebubo ebubo
covalent: Njikọ kpụrụ site n'ịkekọrịta nke electrons n'etiti atọm
dara: Nkwekọrịta kpụrụ site na mmasi dị n'etiti ezigbo cations metal na delocalized electrons
itule nha anya: Usoro kemịkalụ nwere ọnụọgụ nha nha nha nke mmewere nke ọ bụla n'akụkụ abụọ
ahumachi: Nkeji a na-eji tụọ ọnụọgụ ihe (ọnụọgụ nke Avogadro)
\u1ecdn\u1ee5 \u1ecdg\u1ee5g\u1ee5 uka: Nchikota nke proton na neutron n'ime oghere nke atọm
n\u1ecdmba at\u1ecdm: Ọnụọgụ proton dị na oghere atọm (na-ekpebi njirimara elementrị)
isotop: Atọm nke otu mmewere nwere ọnụọgụ neutron dị iche iche
oxidation: Mfu nke elektrọn site na atom ma ọ bụ molekul
mbelata: Nweta elektrọn site na atọm ma ọ bụ molekul
redox: Mmeghachi omume kemịkalụ metụtara ma usoro oxidation na mbelata
ike \u1ecbgbalite: Ike kacha nta achọrọ maka mmeghachi omume kemịkal ime
ihe na-akpali akpali: Ihe na-abawanye ọnụego mmeghachi omume kemịkalụ na-ejighị ya
thermodynamics: Alaka kemistri metụtara okpomọkụ, ọrụ, okpomọkụ, na ume
endothermic: Mmeghachi omume kemịkalụ nke na-amịkọrọ okpomọkụ site na gburugburu
exothermic: Mmeghachi omume kemịkalụ nke na-ahapụ okpomọkụ na gburugburu
